Name: Dulles South Food Pantry
Info: Open Wednesdays by appointment. Serves the Dulles South community within the school boundaries of Freedom H.S., John Champe H.S., Briar Woods H.S., Rock Ridge H.S. or Independence H.S. Guests may visit twice a month.

Name: Loudoun Hunger Relief
Address: 750 Miller Dr SE a1, Leesburg, VA 20175
Info: Drop in Pantry hours: Wednesday, Friday, Saturday 10:00am - 12:45pm; Or by appointment Tuesday 10am-12:45pm, Tuesday and Thursday evenings 5:45-7:15pm. Patrons may visit twice a month. Serves Loudoun residents only.

Name: Seven Loaves Services
Info: Pantry hours: Monday, Wednesday and Friday 10am - 12pm; Clients may visit once a week and there are no geographical restrictions.

Name: Tree Of Life Center
Address: 210 N 21st St unit d, Purcellville, VA 20132
Info: Free dinner every Thursday 5:30-6:30 pm. Bring the family. Free English class after dinner!

Name: Messiah’s Market – Community Church
Info: Pantry hours: Every Tuesday from 7pm to 8pm.

Name: Sterling Park Baptist Church
Info: Pantry hours: Food pantry is open for distribution on the last Tuesday afternoon of every month from 2:45 through 3:30 pm. If you have no transportation, please contact the church office.

Name: Sterling United Methodist – Grace Ministry
Info: Distribution the second Saturday of the month. Doors open at 7am. Distribution is from 8:00am – 10:00am.

Name: LINK Inc
Info: Provides emergency food to people in Herndon, Sterling, and Ashburn. For a food request, please call and leave a message in the mailbox for food assistance. A LINK volunteer will call and schedule a delivery as appropriate.

Name: Reston Bible Church
Info: Pantry hours: Every Wednesday from 11:30am-1:00pm Serves all of Virginia.

Name: Catholic Charities Diocese aka Leesburg Regional Office Food Pantry
Info: Pantry hours: Monday - Thursday, 9:30am to 2:30 pm First and Third Saturdays – 9:30 am to 12:00 pm

Name: New Jerusalem Lutheran Church Western Loudoun Food Pantry
Department of Family Services
Address: Shenandoah Building 102 Heritage Way NE, Suite 103 Leesburg, VA 20177
Info: Hours: Monday – Friday, 8:30 am - 5:00 pm Provides nutritional and financial assistance to low income families.

Name: WIC Supplemental Food Program
Info: Mon, Tues & Thurs 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Wednesday 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Friday  8:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m.

Name: WIC Supplemental Food Program
Address: 163 Fort Evans Road NE Suite 110 Leesburg, VA 20176
Info: Mon, Wed & Thurs 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Tuesday 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Friday 8:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m.

Name: WIC Supplemental Food Program
Address: 22330 S. Sterling Blvd A117 Sterling, VA 20164
Info: 1st Friday of every month 9:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.
